name: Here Comes the Bride (Cyn Mosier, Hayden Gough, Akillingword)
name_original: Here Comes the Bride (Cyn Mosier, Hayden Gough, Akillingword)
description:
You find yourself in an abandoned church, haunted by a blind but restless spirit. This bride-to-be has been dead for decades, and now she spends eternity hunting her cheating would-be groom.

She thinks that's you. 

Navigate the church, find the scattered pages of sheet music, and play the organ to unlock the door.

Hope she doesn't hear you...

Game made for Themed Horror Jam #10: haunting melody

Art: Hayden Gough
Music: Jey Warner
Programming: Devon Mosier

Font is Antiquity Print by SciGho
